data.name: Tales from Candlekeep - Qawasha the Human Druid
data.detailed_description:
Put an end to the Death Curse with Qawasha the Human Druid.

This DLC includes: Qawasha, his custom d20 and *wallpaper. This DLC also unlocks the possibility to play with 5 Heroes at the same time.

Qawasha is a member of the Emerald Enclave base in Fort Beluarian. The druid travels with a vegepymgy companion named Kupalué, a Chultan word that means "walking weed". Qawasha often refers to his companion simply as Weed. They communicate with each other using their own unique sign language.

-- FEATURES --


Along with his vegepygmy friend, Kupalué (”Weed”), Qawasha hopes to rid the jungle of the undead menace that haunts the area.

-- SPECIAL POWER --


Spawn Qawasha's Ally - Kupalué: Kupalué activates during Qawasha's Villain Phase and will attack nearby enemies.

-- AT WILL POWERS --


Shillelagh: Qawasha imbues a wooden staff with nature's power which lets him attack adjacent monsters.

Produce Flame: A powerful ranged attack that lets Qawasha hurl a flame at a distant enemy.

Thorn Whip: Qawasha creates a long vine-like whip covered in thorns that lashes out at his command. If the attack hits its target, the enemy is pulled towards Qawasha.

-- DAILY POWERS --


Call Lightning: A summoned storm cloud hurls down bolts of lightning. Qawasha can target up to three enemies at once for maximum damage output.

Ape Wild Shape: Qawasha assumes the form of a savage ape. This wild shape gives Qawasha the stats of an ape and the ability to attack with both fists at once. If Qawasha's hit points reach 0 in this form, he reverts back to his human form.

Velociraptor Wild Shape: Qawasha assumes the form of a ravenous velociraptor. This wild shape gives Qawasha the stats of a velociraptor and the ability to attack an enemy within 1 tile with a pounce. If Qawasha's hit points reach 0 in this form, he reverts back to his human form.

-- UTILITY POWERS --


Longstrider: The land itself aids Qawasha in his travels. Qawasha's speed is increased, giving him the ability to move farther.

Barkskin: Qawasha's skin becomes rough and rugged like the bark of a tree. Qawasha's armor class increases, making him harder to hit.

Goodberry: Qawasha knows which fruits have the best healing properties. During his Hero Phase, he can heal a small amount of hit points to each hero on his tile.

When purchased and downloaded, the wallpaper artwork will appear at \Steam\steamapps\common\TalesfromCandlekeep\Wallpapers.

data.short_description: Put an end to the Death Curse with Qawasha the Human Druid. This DLC includes: Qawasha, his custom d20 and wallpaper. This DLC also unlocks the possibility to play with 5 Heroes at the same time.

fullgame.name: Tales from Candlekeep: Tomb of Annihilation

data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560, 1024 MB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: El Capitan (10.11) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
